title: JSON schema for .cdsprettier.json
description: This is a JSON schema representation for .cdsprettier.json config files

alignAfterKey.label: Align _element names_ after **key**

alignAnnotations.label: Align _annotations_

alignPreAnnotations.label: pre-annotations
alignPreAnnotations.description: Align _**@**_ of annotations before items. If multiple annotations exist in a line, they are aligned in a tabular way

alignPostAnnotations.label: post-annotations

alignColonsInAnnotations.label: colons

alignValuesInAnnotations.label: values

alignAs.label: Align _**as**_

alignAsInElements.label: in elements
alignAsInElements.description: Align the _**as**_ keyword in entity elements

alignAsInEntities.label: in entities
alignAsInEntities.description: Align the _**as**_ keyword in entities. Alignment scope: encompassing context

alignAsInSelectItems.label: in **select** items
alignAsInSelectItems.description: Align the _**as**_ keyword in entity **select** items

alignAsInUsing.label: in **using**

alignExpressionsAndConditions.label: Align _expressions_ and _conditions_
alignExpressionsAndConditions.description: Align parts of _expressions_ and _conditions_, including left- and right-hand side and operator

alignExprAndCondWithinBlock.label: within block
alignExprAndCondWithinBlock.description: Align parts of _expressions_ and _conditions_ within the encompassing block rather than throughout the whole statement

alignTypes.label: Align _types_ of elements
alignTypes.description: Align _element types_ within entities, type or annotation specifications

alignColonsBeforeTypes.label: including _colons_

alignEqualsAfterTypes.label: including _assignment operators_

alignTypesWithinBlock.label: within block
alignTypesWithinBlock.description: Align _element types_ (and _colons_) within the encompassing block rather than throughout the whole statement

cqlKeywordCapitalization.label: Capitalization style of _CQL keywords_

keepAnnotationsInOriginalLine.label: Line wrapping of _annotations_
keepAnnotationsInOriginalLine.description: Either keeps the line structure of _annotations_ or wraps each annotation in separate line

keepEmptyBracketsTogether.label: Keep empty _brackets_ together
keepEmptyBracketsTogether.description: Keep _bracket pairs_ **{} [] ()** together rather than separating them with whitespace

keepSingleLinedBlocksTogether.label: Keep similar single-lined _blocks_ together
keepSingleLinedBlocksTogether.description: Avoid single-lined _blocks_ of the same type being separated by empty lines

keepOriginalEmptyLines.label: Keep original _empty lines_
keepOriginalEmptyLines.description: Prevent deletion of consecutive empty lines below the limit. If disabled, allow consecutive empty lines to be removed depending on the context.

maxKeepEmptyLines.label: Maximum consecutive _empty lines_
maxKeepEmptyLines.description: Maximum number of consecutive _empty lines_ to keep. Empty lines below this limit may still be removed depending on other settings.

openingBraceInNewLine.label: Line wrapping before opening _brace_

selectInNewLine.label: Line wrapping before _**select**_ of entity or view
selectInNewLine.description: Start _**select**_ statement of entity or view definition in a new line (indented)

tabSize.label: Tab size
tabSize.description: Specify the number of spaces per indentation level

finalNewline.label: Final newline
finalNewline.description: Insert newline character at the end of the file

whitespaceBeforeColon.label: Blank before _colon_
whitespaceBeforeColon.description: Use blank to separate item from following _colon_

whitespaceAfterColon.label: Blank after _colon_
whitespaceAfterColon.description: Use blank to separate _colon_ from following item

whitespaceAfterComma.label: Blank after _comma_
whitespaceAfterComma.description: Use blank to separate _comma_ from following item

whitespaceAroundAlignedOps.label: Blanks around aligned _binary operators_ and _colons_
whitespaceAroundAlignedOps.description: Use blank before and after aligned _binary operators_ and _colons_

whitespaceAroundBinaryOps.label: Blanks around _binary operators_
whitespaceAroundBinaryOps.description: Use blank before and after _binary operators_

whitespaceWithinBrackets.label: Blanks within _brackets_
whitespaceWithinBrackets.description: Use blank after opening and before closing _brackets_ **{} [] ()**
